Sequence Information.Source: amino acid SUBSTITUTION, scorpion defensin, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature.Author: Yang X, Zhang H, Zuo Z, Qin C, Liu Y, Cao Z, Wu Y.2024
Literature.Reference: Int J Biol Macromol. 2024 Oct 31:137151. doi: 10.1016/j.ijbiomac.2024.137151.PubMed
Literature.Title: Novel structural determinants and bacterial death-related regulatory effects of the scorpion defensin BmKDfsin4 against gram-positive bacteria

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (89.19%) toBmKDfsin4C=G: 16%; S: 14%.Chemical modification: 3 disulfide bonds.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC6538 or AB94004 (MIC 0.5-2 uM) and S. epidermidis AB208187 or AB208188 (MIC 2-3 uM). Warning: other bacteria not tested.
